history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: A reference point for pilgrims in Medjugorje
history.paragraph1: Medjugorje Service was born in 2012, almost 30 years after the first apparitions of the Virgin Mary, with the aim of accompanying those who come to this place of prayer and spirituality. With years of experience and deep knowledge of the area, we take care of every detail of your stay: from safety to comfort, from transportation to guided tours.
history.paragraph2: We believe that every pilgrimage is a unique journey. Our task is to make it as peaceful and meaningful as possible.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: We are here to stand by your side
mission.paragraph: In addition to careful technical organization, every group can count on our professional availability, to experience their pilgrimage with peace of mind and trust.

body.title: The JUBILEE and INDULGENCES
body.paragraph1: The Jubilee is an ancient institution of the Catholic Church, dating back to 1300 with Pope Boniface VIII.

paragraph2.before-quote: Pope Francis reminds us that indulgence
paragraph2.quote: allows us to discover how unlimited God's mercy is. It is no coincidence that in ancient times the term mercy was used interchangeably with indulgence, precisely because it expresses the fullness of God's forgiveness which knows no bounds

paragraph3.beforeBold: Indulgence is therefore a grace proper to the Jubilee.
paragraph3.bold: All the faithful who are truly repentant, moved by charity,
paragraph3.afterBold: who during the Holy Year approach the sacrament of Penance, receive the Eucharist, and pray according to the intentions of the Holy Father can obtain it.

body.paragraph4: It can also be applied in suffrage for the souls in Purgatory.

paragraph5.bold: Pope Francis has authorized that the parish church of St. James the Apostle in Medjugorje be designated as a "jubilee door"
paragraph5.normal: an official place where, throughout the ordinary Jubilee of 2025, it will be possible to obtain the plenary indulgence.

body.title: Live an Experience
body.subtitle: Radio Guide Service for Pilgrimages
body.intro: Since 2012, we have been offering a professional radio guide rental service for pilgrimage groups, designed to accompany every moment with reflection, sharing, and spirituality.
body.benefits: Thanks to the radio guides, it is possible to follow catechesis, prayer moments, and guided tours in silence and meditation, without losing contact with your group.
body.integration: The system is also integrated with the parish evening program: pilgrims can listen to its simultaneous translation in major languages, remaining united in prayer even in different idioms.
body.closure-before-link: A service designed to make the pilgrimage more collected, organized, and profound.
body.closure-link: to book the radio guides for your group.
